pages.text: Nether's Delight expands the culinary world into the fiery depths of the Nether. $(br2)Explore new ingredients and recipes using the Blackstone Stove and other tools.
Start by crafting a Blackstone Stove using blackstone and a furnace. $(br2)Cook unique dishes like Grilled Strider and Hoglin Roast over the Nether's infernal flames.
Add a dash of spice to your meals with the Crimson Fungus Stew or delve into exotic flavors with the Soulfire Jelly. $(br2)Nether's Delight brings a new fiery twist to your culinary adventures!
